name: Endless Cargo
shortDescription: Intermodal shipping containers for Endless Sky
description: Adds shipping containers, container ships, and missions involving using the latter to deliver the former to places all over the galaxy.

name: Easier Korath Automatons
shortDescription: Makes capturing Korath Automata easier.
description: Decreases self-destructing chances by half to make capturing the Korath automata ships easier.

name: Fire Corporation Plugin
shortDescription: A plugin about an manufacturing faction called Fire Corporation that hates pirates and will not allow them to have their ships. Contributions welcome!
description: Fire Corporation is a manufacturing faction that makes several human ships. They hate pirates, and will try their best to keep them away from their ships. Please help by contributing to the storyline!

name: Blended Ships
shortDescription: A spliced ships plugin for Endless Sky where all the ships are made in Blender.
description: Blended Ships is the realistic spliced ship plugin. All these ships have thumbnails, believeable stats, and actual potential uses! There is also a greater variety of civilian ships available, to support various playstyles.

name: Tugderic's Addons
shortDescription: a plugin i made for fun that adds missions, outfits, wandering fleets, merchant Company and a pirate Gang.
description: it's just a lil plugin i made for fun, it adds some fleets to human space, a Government of Friendly Merchant who can Escort you if they like you enough, A strong pirate gang wandering through the galaxy, unlockable outfits, and some missions, also some things out of human space.

name: A Conscience Plugin
shortDescription: You get more help from the Quarg so you don't have to kill civilians by dropping a big bomb on Zenith.
description: I may add more "conscience" adjustments in the future, but for now, you get more help from the Quarg to destroy the Korath drones. This allows you to not kill civilians on Zenith and not need to capture a Korath war fleet to accomplish that.

name: Crisis in Management
shortDescription: Alternate start in Syndicate space, with a story parallel to the main plot.
description: Crisis in Management is an alternate start in the Syndicate, the story of a manger who quits managing and start piloting. Leave your failing company and take to the stars to escape repercussions, then find yourself in the background, behind the scenes of Endless Sky's main storyline. Beyond that, the same endless sky awaits.

name: Galactic War
shortDescription: A large content plugin adding a whole new galaxy with over dozens of aliens with storylines(in progress).
description: A large content plugin adding 1 Accessible galaxy, 16+ Races with their own ships and outfits. Technologies ranging from less than human to beyond even the Drak, in total of over 100 Ships, 400 Outfits, and 1500 Systems. To access the galaxy you will need a Jump Drive, head to the north(top) most system in the Wanderer space, wormhole system will be close by.

name: The Adamas Project
shortDescription: Adds a very advanced race of aliens to the northeast section of the galaxy.
description: This plugin adds a race of highly advanced Tier 2 - 3 aliens known as the Adamas to the northeast section of the galaxy, accessible through wormholes. The aliens are friendly, but they have their own versions of pirates. The Scavengers have their own galaxy that they live in, and from which they mount raids upon the Adamas. Be careful you do not get in their way, as some of their ships are armed with stolen quarg tech!

name: Mega Freight
shortDescription: Adds several mostly civilian ships for you and npc merchants (and pirates) to use for more variety in human space. Updated to Unstable releases.
description: This plugin adds several civilian and some military ships to add some more variety to human space and beyond. Mostly focused around larger ships but also have smaller freighters and starter-level ships as well. Will be updated to be compatible with lastest unstable release.

name: sensor
shortDescription: A small mod, adds SOME weapons.
description: Adds a lot of weapons, (:

name: Ciu Kreo
shortDescription: A feature-rich all-content plugin with both content creators and general users in mind.
description: An all-content plugin for Endless Sky. To be used to assist in content creation, or just for general use.

name: All Content Plugin
shortDescription: Endless Sky plugin giving the player access to all ships and outfits.
description: This plugin was made to allow content creators to have access to all outfits in a single place, for the purpose of designing and testing outfit loadouts for new ships. Of course, it can also be used by people who want to ruin the game for themselves by getting a massive fleet without needing to work for it.

name: A Coalition at War
shortDescription: Pick a side in the war between the Coalition and Quarg. I am looking for story and mission suggestions https://github.com/mathwhiz1212/A-Coalition-At-War/
description: You hear a lot about the conflict between the Coalition and the Quarg in Endless Sky, but you never see it. This plugin introduces a storyline that lets you see or join that conflict. You can loot Quarg ships or capture Heliarch ships depending on the side you choose. You can start the few implemented missions by landing on "Tebuteb's Table" in the Tebuteb system and accept the anamoly mission. Please consider helping to add more misisons and stories https://github.com/mathwhiz1212/A-Coalition-At-War/issues/new/choose

name: ES-Advanced-Starts
shortDescription: Adds more starting options to Endless-Sky.
description: Adds several new starts to Endless-Sky including Syndicate and Deep starts.

name: Ruin The Fun
shortDescription: Cheat plugin, to ruin your fun, or to assist you in making or testing another plugin. https://github.com/Pshy0/es-ruin-the-fun
description: Ruin-The-Fun is a cheat/development plugin. Change your captain's name, choose the color swizzle of your ships, edit your reputation with other governments, set your combat rank, hire a powerful escort, gift yourself pre-outfitted ships, give yourself money, and much more. All ships and outfits are also available from a few added systems. https://github.com/Pshy0/es-ruin-the-fun

name: BetterVanillaHai
shortDescription: Adds Hai ships with a wide variety of human/Hai outfits to human fleets in the late-game. Spices up pirate combat and adds variety.
description: Check the readme file for detailed information.

name: Prism Plugin
shortDescription: Allows you to change your ship swizzle(colors, sort of) easily in game.
description: The plugin adds missions on every star that let you change your fleet swizzle to a few options. When you start the game you get access to two, eventually you will find all 6. Look in the about.txt file for spoilers on where to get em. It should be mostly lore friendly.

name: Core Mining, Inc.
shortDescription: Adds another storyline in the early game, following a business getting started in Syndicate space.
description: The Core Mining, Inc. plugin adds a storyline that offers you the chance to work for a newly started company by the same name. You start with them from the very beginning and help build up the company. Along the way, you can make different choices which may impact the game at a later time, as well as potentially make major changes to the plotline. Not everything is in place at the current time, but this plugin should fit in seamlessly with the the vanilla game.

name: Space Shuttle Start
shortDescription: An alternate start plugin featuring an old Earth relic.
description: Start in the Sol system with an old Earth relic for your ship. The space shuttle has no weapons, but lots of cargo space.

name: ES-ui-upgrades
shortDescription: A plugin that aims to transform the UI.
description: This plugin aims to be the first plugin to transform the UI. It tries to make it into a more digital interface, with floating transparent blue windows.

name: Arion - Air Superiority
shortDescription: Plugin that adds a bunch of interesting things, mainly some modern military planes and weapons.
description:
An Endless Sky plugin that adds a variety of things to endless sky, including:
-Real life fighters
-Real life bombers
-Ace combat super planes
-Xenonauts fighters
-A bunch of new H2H weapons based on real life weapons
-Advanced outfits
-Specialized weapons
-Superweapons
-Custom capital ships
-1 (or 2) new 'short campaigns' and some new jobs
-ETC
Special thanks to 1010todd, yuyuko_saigyouji. and gefulltetaubenbrust for some of the sprites.

name: Early Starts
shortDescription: Start the game at one of five earlier dates
description: Real simple. Start the same way, in the same place, but earlier. Why? The big reason would be more time before the plot kicks off (which is date-based). You can use that time to get started on quests that are unavailable after the plot starts, or to prep yourself well for the main plot, or just to play for years without having to worry about the plot.

name: Sheragi Rebirth
shortDescription: Plugin for Endless Sky that reintroduces the Sheragi.
description: Play through a new breath of content reviving the most mysterious species, the Sheragi.

name: World Forge
shortDescription: A plugin for Endless Sky that allows the player to access everything in the game in one place.
description: A plugin for Endless Sky that allows the player to access everything in the game in one place. Includes features that the all-content plugin does not have such as the ability to boost your combat rating and change your friendly/hostile status with factions of the game without having to save-edit. Intended to help content creators test their plugins.

name: Eternals
shortDescription: Add two new factions northeast of Unfettered space.
description: A content plugin for Endless Sky. It adds two new factions northeast of Unfettered space, the Valuutians and the Lost Ones.

name: High DPI
shortDescription: High-DPI graphics for Endless Sky.
description: This plugin contains double resolution graphics, which are only used if you have a high-dpi monitor or if you set the zoom level above 100%. This will roughly double the amount of memory used by the game.

name: Midnight Expansion
shortDescription: Plugin using ships, outfits, or other resources from plugins by other creators or derivatives of their original creations.
description: Expanded content derived from the plugins of other creators. Some contents may require other Midnight Plugins creations.

name: Logbook Help
shortDescription: Adds a Help tab to the Logbook which can be used as a centralized location to review or preview various helpful game tips.
description: Adds a Help tab to the Logbook which can be used as a centralized location to review or preview various helpful game tips.

name: Beccas Endless Expansion
shortDescription: New weapons, outfits and ships for many factions of the game Endless Sky, all with new sprites close to the vanilla ones!
description: New weapons, outfits and ships for many factions of the game Endless Sky, all with new sprites close to the vanilla ones! All you have to do is explore, fly in your ship and meet all the factions in the game.

name: Aben
shortDescription: Fills in space in the galaxy with a new alien species.
description:
Beyond the reaches of ordinary space faring civilizations lie the cluster of systems afforded to the Aben. Impressive technological advancement contrasts the clear non expansionist nature of the Aben, they believe in cooperation between all life and rarely show signs of hostility.
This plugin is part of the Adde Endless Sky collection.

name: Main Plot Plus
shortDescription: A plugin mostly centered around improving the main plot.
description: Have you ever had trouble getting the Free Worlds campaign to start, or accidentally failed a key mission? Have you ever thought that all sides were equally bad or wanted to join an unimplemented side? Have you ever wondered what happened to the Mark II Syndicate ships? Well, you will not be able to join the Navy, and joining the Syndicate requires the Crisis in Management plugin, but otherwise, this plugin is for you.

name: Lampyrid Start
shortDescription: Enables an alternate start wherein the player starts with a modified Lampyrid.
description: Have you ever wanted to start Endless Sky flying something a bit more unique than the typical shuttle, starbarge, or sparrow? Have you dreamed of having a pilot that starts their carreer with an old ship they've been fixing up for the past few years? Well, Lampyrid Start does that. Choosing this starts has your pilot start their career flying a slighly modified version of the Lampyrid, which is a decent balanced transport/freighter with the capacity to be fairly fast compared to others of its class.

name: Fighter Factory
shortDescription: Add outfit to produce replacement fighters. Updated to latest stable.
description: Add outfit to produce replacement fighters. To use, after installing the Fighter Assembler outfit depart and land once then check the job board to record the current number of fighters. Now if the number of fighter ever drop below the recorded number new one will be made to replace it as long as supply is available. Will be updated to latest stable release.

name: Spacefarer
shortDescription: One Jump Drive; No ship capturing; No plundering installed outfits.
description: As a captain, you're responsible for the lives of your crew.  Loss of life is inevitable in the merciless reaches of space.  You stick to exploration, ferrying, and fleet combat.  If anyone dies, it will be everyone when the ship explodes.  This plugin adds replay value by forcing the player to discover alternate and competing forms of income in order to efficiently obtain a fleet.

name: The Enclave
shortDescription: The Enclave focuses around the discovery of an isolated group of humans in a distant galaxy. Separated from the rest of their species for over half a millennium, how have these people developed?
description: The Enclave is a story-driven plugin focused on the discovery of an isolated group of humans stranded, hundreds of years ago, in another galaxy. I'd recommend you have a large Tier 2 fleet at least to complete the (admittedly still in-progress) story. Special thanks to Derpy Horse (https://github.com/Amazinite) for adding the animated stars.

name: Lemuria's Extra ES Stuff
shortDescription: Extra ES Stuff by Lemuria. May contain traces of Sayari.
description: A general plugin that adds a new set of systems to explore near the Deep, data drives, and data delivery missions. No ships. As for the Illumina and Illuria systems, beware name confusion! The dockworkers will be very angry.

name: Outfit Highlighter
shortDescription: Makes the selected outfit stand out more in the outfitter screen.
description: Makes the selected outfit stand out more in the outfitter screen. Recommended for those who prefer to navigate the outfitter using the keyboard instead of the mouse. Now includes themed highlighters! To change themes, copy the image from the chosen theme's subfolder and paste into the plugin's ui folder.

name: SpaceCrate
shortDescription: A trade oriented mod for Endless Sky.
description: SpaceCrate adds planet X-283N1 in the Alpha Centauri system. A rapidly developing world obsessed with trade and exports. Run by CEO Arnan de Gans this obsession attracts workers from many planets and results in lucrative trade.

name: High DPI Continuous
shortDescription: High-DPI graphics for Endless Sky.
description: This plugin contains double resolution graphics, which are only used if you have a high-dpi monitor or if you set the zoom level above 100%. This will roughly double the amount of memory used by the game.

name: Cromha Expansion Plugin
shortDescription: Add new high-tier and low-tier factions and expand the existing one. Adds different new storyline and introduce new gameplay mechanics.
description: Adds a new civilization to the Korath Space (now named the 'Empire Space'): The Cromha Empire. Also known as 'The Empire', it is a government that dirige a huge part of the north of the Milky Way. It also a very high advanced government. They are human but don't directly have contact with human Merchants, they have contact with the Syndicate, the Republic but they don't allow them to enter their territory. Know more about the plugin in the wiki! (or test the game yourself)

name: Midnight Scrapyard
shortDescription: A plugin suggesting an epilogue for the Kor Sestor region of Endless Sky. Includes some new ships, outfits, and missions.
description: This region of space has abandoned derelicts waiting to be scavenged. But something lurks amongst the wreckage...

name: Omnis
shortDescription: The most extensive all-content plugin to date, for development or fun.
description:
The most extensive all-content plugin to date. All vanilla content and the content of many plugins available to use to put together different ship builds. Many more tools are included into Omnis too!
This plugin is part of the Adde Endless Sky collection.

name: Quaernan Start
shortDescription: ES Custom start.  Quaernan Humans are a Tier 3 civilization with human expansionism at its peak around the 31st century; started by the Syndicate stoking innovation and to forestall a galactic recession.
description: An endless sky plugin that adds an extremely powerful set of ships and missions accessed via a custom start, intended for testing other extremely strong plugin factions or just generally playing around with.

name: Lost in Midnight
shortDescription: Lost in Midnight is a mission focused plugin for the Endless Sky game. Features new missions, systems, outfits, ships, and variants.
description: Lost technology, Lost knowledge, And people, who have lost their way trying to navigate life in this vast galaxy...

name: Better Vanilla Pirates
shortDescription: Makes pirates more interesting, varied, with many more pirate fighting missions.
description: Adds 30+ high end variants for human heavy warships and marauders using a wide variety of outfit combinations. These will be seen in pirate fleets, merchant fleets, and adds 30+ new pirate hunting/defence/blockade missions. Adds new "Bounty Hunted" fleets that will hunt you down without warning. Adds new "Korath Raid" missions in certain Syndicate systems where the Korath will attack with their Sestor/Mereti drones, allowing you to capture these ships post-Wanderer campaign.

name: Portraits for News
shortDescription: This plugin re-activates the portrait system for news in ES.
description: This plugin re-activates the portrait system for news in ES. All the images for portraits are already in the game, but became unused after portraits for news was disabled by default. Alien portraits (including transhuman portraits) are not considered canon.

name: Kinetic Weaponry
shortDescription: Adds current-day weaponry to Endless Sky
description: A plugin adding modern realistic weapons to Endless Sky. They are tier 1 human weapons, already balanced to work as anti-capital ship weapons.

name: Old Bounty Hunting Missions
shortDescription: Replaces timed bounty hunting missions with the old untimed ones.
description: Feel like the timed bounty missions in Endless Sky are too fast for your taste? Want to stack those jobs, perhaps as a challenge for a ship build or just for that satisfying feeling of credits rolling in after a long patrol? Then this plugin is for you :)

name: Celestial Strands
shortDescription: Celestial Strands is a plug-in for Endless Sky that adds a new area of content based on the original Escape Velocity games, primarily Escape Velocity Override.
description: Celestial Strands brings content from the original Escape Velocity series, primarily Escape Velocity Override, to Endless Sky in a new playable area. The plug-in focuses on the various factions of the Crescent, including the Strands, Zachit, and Miranu, and their presence in a new, young galaxy. Will the Strands reunite once more under the same banner, or will inner turmoil be their undoing yet again?

name: Exporianes
shortDescription: Adds a new race of T5 Aliens.
description: Adds a new race of T5 aliens to a new galaxy. They can be reached after completing the Emerald Sword missions and having a combat rating of 13.

name: Endless Sky Starbridge Pack
shortDescription: Get Yer Starbridges here! Adds the Starbridge from EVN to Endless Skies, Mod Starbridge and Railgun Starbridge variants included!
description: Get Yer Starbridges here! Adds the Starbridge from EVN to Endless Skies, Mod Starbridge and Railgun Starbridge variants included! Also, two types of infinite ammunition railguns have been added for the authentic EVN experience. The ships and weapons can be bought from various advanced shipyards and outfitters. As a fallback, all Starbridge variants and outfits featured in this mod are available at any Syndicate Advanced shipyard.
